name: http_channel_lib
short_description: Http_channel_lib is a UNIX library to establish a client/server communication trought HTTP/1.0 and MIME. It can encode data (base64, quoted printable) and it's compliant with RFCs 821, 1945, 2045. Included full documentation in italian.
